DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy non-invasive subcutaneous fat layer reduction alternative treatment parameter .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Male female subject > 18 year age < 65 year age . 2 . Subject clearly visible fat flank , investigator 's opinion , may benefit treatment . 3 . Subject weight change exceed 10 pound precede month . 4 . Subject body mass index ( BMI ) 30 . BMI define weight pound multiply 703 divide square height inch . 5 . Subject agree maintain his/her weight ( i.e. , within 5 pound ) make major change diet lifestyle course study . 6 . Subject read sign write informed consent form . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Subject surgical procedure ( ) area intend treatment . 2 . Subject invasive fat reduction procedure ( e.g. , liposuction , mesotherapy ) area intend treatment . 3 . Subject noninvasive fat reduction and/or body contour procedure area intend treatment within past 12 month . 4 . Subject need administer , know history subcutaneous injection area intend treatment ( e.g. , heparin , insulin ) within past month . 5 . Subject known history cryoglobulinemia , cold urticaria , paroxysmal cold hemoglobinuria . 6 . Subject known history Raynaud 's disease , know condition response cold exposure limit blood flow skin . 7 . Subject history bleed disorder take medication investigator 's opinion may increase subject 's risk bruising . 8 . Subject take take diet pill supplement within past month . 9 . Subject dermatological condition , moderate excessive skin laxity , scar location treatment site may interfere treatment evaluation ( stretch mark exclusion ) . 10 . Subject active implant device pacemaker , defibrillator , drug delivery system 11 . Subject pregnant intending become pregnant study period ( next 5 month ) . 12 . Subject lactate lactate past 6 month . 13 . Subject history hernia area treat . 14 . Subject unable unwilling comply study requirement . 15 . Subject currently enrol clinical study unapproved investigational drug device . 16 . Any condition laboratory value would , professional opinion investigator , potentially affect subject 's response integrity data would pose unacceptable risk subject .
